content.body: Are definitions for BoundNames of the second and third alternatives of NamedImports missing, or is there some rule elsewhere that takes care of it? https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-imports-static-semantics-boundnames
(It’s clear that it would proxy the BoundNames of ImportsList, I’m just not sure where that gets specified)
nm, found it, fourth paragraph here https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-algorithm-conventions-syntax-directed-operations
(I found it by searching for "implicit" haha)
